verses.verse: Then said <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto me <S%H4872><s%>, Though Moses and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H5315><s%>, yet my mind would not be toward this people <S%H5971><s%>: cast them out <S%H7971><s%> of my sight <S%H6440><s%>, and let them go forth <S%H3318><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H559><s%>, when they say unto thee <S%H3318><s%>, Whither shall we go forth? then thou shalt tell <S%H559><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Such as are for death <S%H4194><s%>, to death <S%H4194><s%>; and such as are for the sword <S%H2719><s%>, to the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and such as are for the famine <S%H7458><s%>, to the famine <S%H7458><s%>; and such as are for captivity <S%H7628><s%>, to captivity <S%H7628><s%>.

And I will appoint <S%H6485><s%> over them four <S%H702><s%> kinds <S%H4940><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: the sword <S%H2719><s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%>, and the dogs <S%H3611><s%> to tear <S%H5498><s%>, and the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, to devour <S%H398><s%> and to destroy <S%H7843><s%>.

And I will cause <S%H5414><s%> them to be tossed <S%H2189><s%> to and fro among all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, because <S%H1558><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, for that which he did <S%H6213><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

For who will have pity <S%H2550><s%> upon thee <S%H3389><s%>, O Jerusalem? or who will bemoan <S%H5110><s%> thee <S%H5493><s%>? or who will turn aside to ask <S%H7592><s%> of thy welfare <S%H7965><s%>?

Thou hast rejected <S%H5203><s%> me <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou art gone <S%H3212><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>: therefore have I stretched out <S%H5186><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against thee <S%H7843><s%>, and destroyed thee <S%H3811><s%>; I am weary with repenting <S%H5162><s%>.

And I have winnowed <S%H2219><s%> them with a fan <S%H4214><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; I have bereaved <S%H7921><s%> them of children <S%H6><s%>, I have destroyed my people <S%H5971><s%>; they returned not from their ways <S%H1870><s%>.

Their widows <S%H490><s%> are increased <S%H6105><s%> to me above the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>; I have brought <S%H935><s%> upon them against the mother <S%H517><s%> of the young men <S%H970><s%> a destroyer <S%H7703><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%>: I have caused anguish <S%H6597><s%> and terrors <S%H928><s%> to fall <S%H5307><s%> upon her suddenly <S%H6597><s%>.

She that hath borne <S%H3205><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> languisheth <S%H535><s%>; she hath given up <S%H5301><s%> the ghost <S%H5315><s%>; her sun <S%H8121><s%> is gone <S%H935><s%> down while it was yet day <S%H3119><s%>; she hath been put to shame <S%H2659><s%> and confounded <S%H954><s%>: and the residue <S%H7611><s%> of them will I deliver <S%H5414><s%> to the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me <S%H517><s%>, my mother, that thou hast borne <S%H3205><s%> me a man <S%H376><s%> of strife <S%H7379><s%> and a man <S%H376><s%> of contention <S%H4066><s%> to the whole earth <S%H776><s%>! I have not lent <S%H5383><s%>, neither have men lent <S%H5383><s%> to me <S%H7043><s%>; yet every one of them doth curse me.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Verily <S%H3808><s%> I will strengthen <S%H2896><s%> thee for good <S%H8281><s%>; verily <S%H518><s%> I will cause the enemy <S%H341><s%> to make supplication <S%H6293><s%> unto thee in the time <S%H6256><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> and in the time <S%H6256><s%> of affliction <S%H6869><s%>.
Can one break <S%H7489><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%>, even iron <S%H1270><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>?

Thy substance <S%H2428><s%> and thy treasures <S%H214><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> for a spoil <S%H957><s%> without price <S%H4242><s%>, and that for all thy sins <S%H2403><s%>, even in all thy borders <S%H1366><s%>.

And I will make them to pass <S%H5674><s%> with thine enemies <S%H341><s%> into a land <S%H776><s%> which thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H784><s%>; for a fire is kindled <S%H6919><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, which shall burn upon you <S%H3344><s%>.

O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou knowest <S%H3045><s%>; remember <S%H2142><s%> me <S%H6485><s%>, and visit me <S%H5358><s%>, and avenge me of my persecutors <S%H7291><s%>; take me not away <S%H3947><s%> in thy longsuffering <S%H639><s%>: know <S%H3045><s%> that for thy sake I have suffered <S%H5375><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%>.

Thy words <S%H1697><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%>, and I did eat <S%H398><s%> them <S%H1697><s%>; and thy words were unto me a joy <S%H8342><s%> and the rejoicing <S%H8057><s%> of my heart <S%H3824><s%>: for I am called <S%H7121><s%> by thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

I sat <S%H3427><s%> not in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of them that make merry <S%H7832><s%>, nor rejoiced <S%H5937><s%>; I sat <S%H3427><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; for thou hast filled <S%H4390><s%> me with indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

Why is my pain <S%H3511><s%> perpetual <S%H5331><s%>, and my wound <S%H4347><s%> incurable <S%H605><s%>, which refuseth <S%H3985><s%> to be healed <S%H7495><s%>? wilt thou indeed be unto me as a deceitful <S%H391><s%> brook <S%H4325><s%>, as waters that fail <S%H539><s%>?

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, If thou return <S%H7725><s%>, then will I bring thee again <S%H7725><s%>, that thou mayest stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H3318><s%>; and if thou take forth the precious <S%H3368><s%> from the vile <S%H2151><s%>, thou shalt be as my mouth <S%H6310><s%>: they shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto thee <S%H7725><s%>, but thou shalt not return unto them.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> thee unto this people <S%H5971><s%> a fortified <S%H1219><s%> brazen <S%H5178><s%> wall <S%H2346><s%>; and they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against thee <S%H3201><s%>, but they shall not prevail against thee <S%H3467><s%>; for I am with thee to save thee and to deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee <S%H5002><s%>, saith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And I will deliver <S%H5337><s%> thee out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7451><s%>, and I will redeem <S%H6299><s%> thee out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the terrible <S%H6184><s%>.
